nl.naturalis.nda.elasticsearch.client

Class IndexManagerNative

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.naturalis.nda.elasticsearch.client.IndexManagerNative
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IndexManager

    public class IndexManagerNative
extends Object
implements IndexManager
    An implementation of IndexManager that uses ElasticSearch's Native Java client. This is the implementation of the IndexManager interface used throughout the NBA Import library.
    Author:
    Ayco Holleman

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      IndexManagerNative(org.elasticsearch.client.Client client, String indexName)
      Create an instance manipulating the specified index using the specified client.

      • saveObjects

        public void saveObjects(String type,
                        List<?> objs)
                 throws BulkIndexException
        Description copied from interface: IndexManager
        Adds multiple objects to the index, presumably using ElasticSearch's bulk processing capabilities.
        Specified by:
        saveObjects in interface IndexManager
        Parameters:
        type - The type of the document
        objs - The objects to add
        Throws:
        BulkIndexException - Thrown if some of the specified objects could not be indexed.

      • saveObjects

        public void saveObjects(String type,
                        List<?> objs,
                        List<String> ids)
                 throws BulkIndexException
        Description copied from interface: IndexManager
        Adds multiple objects to the index, presumably using ElasticSearch's bulk processing capabilities.
        Specified by:
        saveObjects in interface IndexManager
        Parameters:
        type - The type of the document
        objs - The objects to add
        ids - The ids of the objects to add. For each object you must specify an ID. In other words the sizes of the objs list and the ids list must be equal. If you want Lucene to generate the IDs for you, specify null.
        Throws:
        BulkIndexException - Thrown if some of the specified objects could not be indexed.

      • saveObjects

        public void saveObjects(String type,
                        List<?> objs,
                        List<String> ids,
                        List<String> parentIds)
                 throws BulkIndexException
        Description copied from interface: IndexManager
        Adds multiple objects to the index, presumably using ElasticSearch's bulk processing capabilities.
        Specified by:
        saveObjects in interface IndexManager
        Parameters:
        type - The type of the document
        objs - The objects to add
        ids - The ids of the objects to add. For each object you must specify an ID. In other words the sizes of the objs list and the ids list must be equal. If you want Lucene to generate the IDs for you, specify null.
        parentIds - The IDs of the parents of the objects. Specify null if the objects do not have a relational parent.
        Throws:
        BulkIndexException - Thrown if some of the specified objects could not be indexed.

        public org.elasticsearch.client.Client getClient()
